How to reduce lag:
Stop putting endless amounts of shit in the process method.
Stop putting endless amounts of shit in the “client” class.
Program the servers properly.

item.title: Are you lagging bad on your server? -1 fix for it-
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

It wouldn’t work because, the specialBar is set at 0 when you login, so as time goes by it goes to 100 or whatever it is, since i’m not allowing this anymore, the bar won’t fill, thus no specials.

And for servers that start out with full specialBar, once you use it, it can’t go back up, because it checks if your bar is full or not or whatever.

Oh and i just put back specials, i used to lag at 12, now i’m at 15, let’s see.

Read full topic

item.source: Are you lagging bad on your server? -1 fix for it-

item.title: Are you lagging bad on your server? -1 fix for it-
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

Well I found out that something caused lag. It wasn’t the special attacks, it was the special attacks refilling that was causing that lag

I guess I’ll post here, because this isn’t really a teaching tutorial and this helps server I guess

I found this out when I put that piece of code in, it started lagging at 20, and I got about 10 complaints that they were lagging. I removed that and it can hold back 40-50 again

So in public void process/public boolean process you would remove

[code]if(SpecialDelay <= 9)
SpecDelay++;
if(SpecDelay == 50)
{
SpecialDelay++;
SpecDelay = 0;
}

if(strDelay <= 9)
strDelay++;
if(strDelay == 50)
{
strDelay = 0;
}

if (specialAmount <= 99 && specialDelay <= 0) {
specialAmount += 1;
specialDelay = 4;
specialAttacks();
specialAttacks2();
specialAttacks3();
specialAttacks4();
specialAttacks5();
specialAttacks6();
}
specialDelay -= 1;
l33thax(12323);
l33thax(7574);
l33thax(7599);
l33thax(7549);
l33thax(8493);
l33thax(7499);

if (strAmount <= 99 && strDelay <= 0) {
strAmount += 1;
strDelay = 4;
}[/code]

Remove it for a while, have a lot of players on and see if it really did stop some lag.

This will not remove your special attacks, only your refilling.

Also if it works please post and say it works so i can add your name to the list that this helped

I dont know if this removes your specs or not, please someone remove that code, and try specs. Tell me if they work or not anymore

Who this has helped:
D 3 A T H
Java Is My CENSORED™
n0va k0

Read full topic
item.source: Are you lagging bad on your server? -1 fix for it-
